channel.title: Cubic Telecom on BarCamp Cork
channel.description: Recent content in Cubic Telecom on BarCamp Cork

item.title: Two more Sponsors
item.description:
A big thank you to Pat Phelan of Cubic Telecom for sponsoring the lunch at BarCamp. The ice-swans and champagne fountains have been ordered. But seriously, Pat has been a fantastic supporter of of the tech community and many of us are in his debt.
Thanks also to John Henry Donovan of 5pieces who took care of the licensing of our sign-up form. This was totally unexpected and very much appreciated.

item.title: Pre-BarCamp Dinner
item.description: Pat Phelan and Alexia Golez are organizing a pre-Barcamp Cork dinner and they would love you to come along. It’s on in Bangkok93 (A Taste Of Thailand) on Friday 31st of October at 8pm. Numbers are limited to 25 so please leave your name over in his blog comments to confirm you are coming. Budget for around â‚¬25 a head.
